name: Sungaia Saga
storyline: Two rival clans, one divided land. Your brother gets taken by the enemy clan. Will you help the enemy in return for his safety? Or use the Beat Blade to take him back by force? Your choice changes the entire adventure.
summary: Take the Beat Blade in hand and parry, slash and catch the beat to mimic enemies' special moves. Will you help the enemy clan in return for your kidnapped brother? Or fight back and take him by force? In this rhythm-action platformer, your choice will shape the entire adventure...
